title: Eating Kosher in the Heart of Syria: Lamb-Stuffed Zucchini but Hold the Yogurt
summary_full: In the post-Assad era, more Jews are visiting a country that some fled decades ago. One hotel restaurant offers a corner where religious dietary requirements are melded with the local cuisine.
summary_public: In the post-Assad era, more Jews are visiting a country that some fled decades ago. One hotel restaurant offers a corner where religious dietary requirements are melded with the local cuisine.
